lexUnit.name: murder.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: the unlawful premeditated killing of one person by another.

sentence.text: A magistrate who 's on trial for attempting to murder his wife by pumping car exhaust fumes into her bedroom has been explaining why he started her car at three o'clock in the morning .
